title: Good Shirt, Green Shirt
description: This retro arcade-like game was the submission for a 72 hour game jam. I worked on many aspects of the main game loop as well as the UI animations. This was developed with 1 other person.

title: Athenaeum
description: This deckbuilding roguelike was the Video Game Development Club's first ever long term project. My main contribution was leading the team in charge of the game's procedurally generated map.

title: Vision Fridge
description: This is a mobile app that I helped develop for my internship at San Diego Supercomputer Center (SDSC). It is a platform that allows users to receive recipe recommendations, follow recipes, and share their cooking with their friends.

title: Mariposa
description: This is a narrative, puzzle-platformer that is released on Steam. This was the Video Game Development Club's second large team, long term project. I was the lead developer for the puzzles in the game.
